 Career Objective :
I am looking for an opportunity to work with a progressive Organization to 
make use of my skills towards the growth of the organization and become an 
asset to the team I work for by learning new set of skills which are needed to 
achieve professional goals.

packaging division, 
(Production handling , manpower handling  and shift management machine 
operation and there maintenance of machine 
from July 2014 –till date
Designation- supervisor
working role - production supervisor
Responsibilities : 
Execute the production as per the plan. (This include interaction with stores,
purchase, quality & methods departments to get the material on time & solve any
issues  (tool/machine  problems,  Rework  of  parts  etc)  contributing  to  line
stoppages.
Monitoring every day’s production target and discuss with superior to solve any
issues related to production stoppages.
Inventory control at WIP.
Achieve a high level of operator efficiency.
Control of manpower as per shift schedule.
Achieving of daily / monthly plan / production targets.
To maintain Hygiene and Good Manufacturing practices (GMP) norms of plant.
To maintain Hazard analysisand critical control point (HACCP) preventive system
  
Key skills:
Manufacturing,  production  planning,  shift  management,  production
management. Machine maintenance
